quiz:
You have 180 minutes (3 hours) to take this test.
To start the test, you will need the passcode **start-midterm**.
Good luck!
To begin, download the following zip file: Sample File System
You can use this pdf as a reminder of bit functionality:
Which image will the following code produce?
```python from byubit import Bit
def turn(bit): bit.left() bit.move() bit.left()
@Bit.empty_world(5, 3) def run(bit): while bit.front_clear(): bit.move() bit.paint('green') turn(bit) while bit.front_clear(): bit.move() bit.paint('blue')
if __name__ == '__main__': run(Bit.new_bit) ```
Sure, here are some multiple-choice questions based on the file system we created:
Which directory contains system configuration files? /bin /home /etc /usr
What is the name of the file that contains the password information? resolv.conf passwd hosts grub.cfg
Which user has a RAW image file in their Downloads directory? Eric Tyla root None of the above
How many music files does Tyla have in her Music directory? 5 10 15 20
Which directory contains system libraries? /sbin /proc /lib /boot
